title: True Ghost Stories: Jim Harold's Campfire 2
features: True Ghost Stories! 250+ Pages. 70 Stories. Get Your Copy Of This Supernatural Kindle #1 Best Seller. 2nd Book of Jim Harold's Campfire Series.
Stories of REAL PARANORMAL ACTIVITY That Will Keep You Up At Night!!!
-A Man Who Experienced The Plot Of A Horror Movie,
Those Who Are Unfortunate To Possess It
-PLUS 65 More TRUE, Gut Wrenching Stories of Real Paranormal Activity From The Popular Campfire Podcast
: DON'T BUY THIS BOOK IF YOU ARE EASILY FRIGHTENED!!!!
"I'm glad I am finished editing your book. Your stories freaked me out! I couldn't sleep at night!!!"
On this special audio Campfire, exclusively created for readers of
TRUE GHOST STORIES: Jim Harold's Campfire 2

, Jim replays the audio of his 5 favorite stories from this compilation. You will hear the original retelling of these stories by actual Campfire callers. It is a paranormal countdown in the spirit of the old Top 40 radio shows.  Using the link
EXCLUSIVELY SHARED WITH CAMPFIRE 2 READERS IN THE BOOK
, you'll be able to download or stream this BONUS content to the device of your choice. It is Jim's special thank you gift!
Jim Harold's paranormal podcasts have been downloaded over 18 million times, and the program that gets the most response is his popular Campfire show. In this book,
TRUE GHOST STORIES: Jim Harold's Campfire 2
, Jim shares 70 of the best stories ever featured on the program. You'll read REAL PEOPLE's experiences with ghosts plus some UFO, cryptid and angel stories added for flavor.
you'll love the real thing! BUY
TRUE GHOST STORIES: Jim Harold's Campfire 2
NOTE: YOU DO NOT NEED A KINDLE TO READ A KINDLE BOOK, SEARCH AMAZON FOR THEIR FANTASTIC FREE READING APPS FOR ABOUT EVERY DEVICE KNOWN TO MAN!!!!
If you love haunted stories whether it is haunted houses or whatever this is the book for you!
description: This second volume is even better than the first! Great shortstories--couldn't put it down until it was finished. Can't wait forvolume 3! --
Get ready to be entertained, intrigued, and spooked out of your skin all at once! --
I loved this book! It had lots of paranormal stories told in the wordsof people from all around the world. This book is definitely worthreading. -
Love the book, I hope this becomes an ongoing thing!  So there is going to be a Campfire 3, right!? --

America's most popular paranormal podcaster is Jim Harold. He has had a life long love affair with the strange, the supernatural and the unexplained. You can find his free programs at jimharold.com, on iTunes, Roku, TuneInRadio and via many other apps. The Paranormal Podcast, and Jim Harold's Campfire are regularly among the top podcasts in their categories on iTunes, often outranking programs from mainstream media publishers. Jim lives in Northeastern Ohio with his fantastic wife and two daughters. His favorite pastime is terrifying his listeners with creepy Campfire stories.
